map.name: OSM: Cycle Map
map.code: new OpenLayers.Layer.XYZ("OSM: Cycle Map", "http://b.andy.sandbox.cloudmade.com/tiles/cycle/${z}/${x}/${y}.png", { type: 'png', attribution: 'Map data © OpenStreetMap and contributors CC-BY-SA', isBaseLayer: true, visibility: false, numZoomLevels:17 } )

map.name: OSM: Hike and Bike
map.code: new OpenLayers.Layer.XYZ("OSM: Hike and Bike Map", "http://toolserver.org/tiles/hikebike/${z}/${x}/${y}.png", { type: 'png', isBaseLayer: true, attribution: 'Map Data from OpenStreetMap (CC-by-SA 2.0)' } )

map.name: OSM: Osmarender
map.code: new OpenLayers.Layer.XYZ("OSM: Osmarender", [ "http://a.tah.openstreetmap.org/Tiles/tile/${z}/${x}/${y}.png", "http://b.tah.openstreetmap.org/Tiles/tile/${z}/${x}/${y}.png", "http://c.tah.openstreetmap.org/Tiles/tile/${z}/${x}/${y}.png" ] , { type: 'png', isBaseLayer: true, numZoomLevels: 18 , attribution: 'Map Data from OpenStreetMap (CC-by-SA 2.0)' } )

map.name: Google Satelite
map.code: new OpenLayers.Layer.Google("Google Satellite", {type: G_SATELLITE_MAP, 'sphericalMercator': true, numZoomLevels: 22})

map.name: Hillshading
map.code: new OpenLayers.Layer.XYZ( "Hillshading", "http://toolserver.org/~cmarqu/hill/${z}/${x}/${y}.png", { visibility: false, numZoomLevels: 17, isBaseLayer:false} )
